name: JSON Potfolio
description: A personal portfolio template designed with a JSON theme, where page contents are displayed in JSON objects with Monokai syntax highlighting.

name: Safer Strides
description: A crime heat mapper mobile app that maps real-time police reports from the Toronto Police Twitter account.
techStack: UiPath's Robotic Process Automation (for web scraping)

name: Planit
description: A trip advisor mobile app that generates recommended vacation itineraries through Google Maps API.

name: Spotify-lite
description: A backend for a music player service composed of two REST API microservices for songs and playlists.

name: JShell
description: A Unix-like shell environment with a tree file system and a stack data structure for command history. Used JUnit for unit testing.
